Hoover.Our Lady of the Valley Catholic School:
Our Lady of the Valley Catholic School, which is located in Birmingham, Alabama, is a pre-kindergarten through 8th-grade Catholic elementary and middle school under the direction of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Birmingham in Alabama.


== Honors and awards ==
Our Lady of the Valley (OLV) is a two-time recipient of the United States Department of Education Blue Ribbon School of Excellence award. OLV received the Blue Ribbon School award in 1998-1999 and 2011.
